summary: CAR DEVELOPED A COOLANT LEAK FROM THE INTAKE MANIFOLD.  I'VE SEARCHED AND FOUND THIS TO BE A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THESE VEHICLES.  SOME SORT OF FAULT IN THE INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKETS.  GM INFORMED ME THAT BECAUSE OF THE AGE AND MILEAGE ON THE VEHICLE THEY WILL NOT OFFER ANY ASSISTANCE.  ALSO THE AC CYCLES OFF AND ON RANDOMLY,  ANOTHER PROBLEM COMMON TO THESE VEHICLES
